title: Drawing, "Designs for wallpaper and textiles, flowers", 19th century
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper
markings:
Stamped in black ink right of center in composition: an oval shaped seal with an interlocked CG in the center. Written around the seal: 31 Boulevard Nouvelles
Top right of composition in pencil: B58
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right: B58.
description: Horizontally-oriented diamond shape outlined in graphite visible. Clusters of plants in three corners of diamond. Top corner: light blue-gray and green stems with foliage with tops facing right. Right corner: light green, gray, and brown stems with foliage with tops facing upwards. Bottom corner: three stems with flowers along length and foliage. Top is longer with yellow flowers, bottom two are shorter with purple flowers. All three curve with tops towards the left. Left corner empty. Guidelines in graphite are visible on the page with the diamond bisected horizontally and vertically.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for wallpaper and textiles, flowers", 19th century. Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-107-56.
